channel.title: Productivity on MLWhiz
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on MLWhiz

item.title: Why Sublime Text for Data Science is Hotter than Jennifer Lawrence?
item.description: Just Kidding, Nothing is hotter than Jennifer Lawrence. But as you are here, let’s proceed. For a practitioner in any field, they turn out as good as the tools they use. Data Scientists are no different. But sometimes we don’t even know which tools we need and also if we need them. We are not able to fathom if there could be a more natural way to solve the problem we face.
